CustomField.description: Sale Revenue = Sum(New Capped Costs (S) + In-fleet Capped Costs (S)) * Sum(Building Mark-up + 1) + (Upfront Project Costs (S) * Sum(Upfront Mark-up (S) + 1)) - To be used by Vanguard
CustomField.formula:
IF( ISNULL(SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__c),
((New_Capped_Costs_S__c + In_fleet_Capped_Costs_S__c) * (Building_Mark_up_S__c + 1)) + ( Upfront_Project_Costs_S__c * ( Upfront_Markup_S__c + 1)) ,
((SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.New_Capped_Costs_S__c + SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.In_fleet_Capped_Costs_S__c) * (SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.Building_Mark_up_S__c + 1 )) + ( SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.Upfront_Project_Costs_S__c * ( SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.Upfront_Markup_S__c + 1)) )
CustomField.label: Sale Revenue
